channel.title: DevilsScape V3 release
channel.description:
[SIZE=3]First of all, i'd like to say thanks to everyone who made my private server experience enjoyable including titandino (Even though he came on my server once and tried to glitch it, XD), ItsGoudont (My most favorite person.), My friend sam, and my friend Nick.
This server was first released back long ago, and i've had this for a while so I thought, might as well put it up so somebody else can use it. This server is a 562 loading 668. Oh also, there are a lot of colors on this server and lots of custom items, so anybody who doesn't like customs, just letting ya know, lol. Also, my very sexy GUI/Control Panel will be included on here, so knock yourself out. (All options work on the control panel btw)[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]I DO NOT GIVE ANYBODY PERMISSION TO RELEASE ON ANY OTHER FORUMS WITHOUT MY CONSENT.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Credits: Me (Brainiac/Lucifer667/Milf Hunter) Dragonkk[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Features:
Server Ranks Custom GUI made from scratch Boss pets Bosses Bal'lak Corporeal Beast Nex Jad Gambler (dice) Hint icons Flower game Hangman Mining Fishing Thieving Gilded Altar Bonfires Cooking Essence mining Hunter Ranged icons fix Woodcutting Firemaking Veteran cape after playing for 5 hours Recovery question system Completionist cape Staffzone New training area Hitsplats fix Quests Cook's assistant Letter delivery Dicing Gold dharok Over 200 customs (optionable) Custom fun commands Snow client Custom npcs edited by client Custom models Bone Burying Food eating Buy food by saying 'I wanna buy food' Fun addition to server, an npc that responds to you! It's called Siri xD Potion drinking Custom grand exchange. (It works really damn well, lol) LOTS of other features as well which can be found from original release: [/SIZE]
Media:
[SPOILER="Media"] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sb3D0R5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lIb035Y.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zQh6aMJ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/criNcp3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GquDULU.jpg?1[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d9MkLyH.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Rv8mmSY.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/2066/z4of.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/4619/0lyk.png[/img][/SPOILER]
Download links:
[Spoiler="Download"]Server: [url=http://uppit.com/2dkrnp3xweg5/DevilsScape_Server.zip]DevilsScape_Server[/url] Client: [url=http://uppit.com/u44mykzdy7nt/DevilsScape_Client.zip]DevilsScape_Client[/url] Cache Direct Download: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/65718719/devilsscape_cache.zip]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/65718719/devilsscape_cache.zip[/url][/spoiler]

item.title: DevilsScape V3 release
item.dc:creator: @QuantumRSN QuantumRSN
item.description:
@QuantumRSN wrote:

[quote=“Darth Raseri, post:34, topic:536553”]Keep getting an error message from the client when it tries to download the cache.

java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\user\DevilsScape\cache716013.zip (The system cannot find the file specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at client.extractCache(client.java:2257)
at client.method74(client.java:2437)
at client.method43(client.jave:623)
at Applet_Sub1.method41(Applet_Sub1.java:344)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

I have the cache in C:\Users\user. Not sure about the cache(temp number, keeps changing).zip. Can someone help?[/quote]

Download this cache and put it in DevilscapeServer/data/cache folder.
That should fix your problem. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

c). - portforward your router

how do I fix this? this is what my “run” looks like…

@echo off
title DevilsScape
cd src
cd …
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\java” -Xmx256m -Xss2m -Dsun.java2d.noddraw=true -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseAdaptiveGCBoundary -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=500 -XX:SurvivorRatio=16 -XX:+UseParallelGC -classpath bin;lib/substance.jar;lib/* neo.Execute
pause
